name: INCUR Survival
description:
Get on the official INCUR Survival Discord Server:

Features:


  • Character hunger and thirst mechanics
  • Crafting
  • Gathering resources
  • Procedural Spawning of resources and loot
  • Hunting wildlife and fighting creatures
  • Base Building
  • Farming crops
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Weather changes
  • Swimming and Diving
  • Basic Leveling and Skills System
  • Animal Taming
  • Animal Riding
